div.h2: Welcome to La Salle Elementary School District #122

div.p:
Mission Statement
The mission of the LaSalle Public Elementary Schools is to provide a nurturing, challenging learning environment in order to assist each student in becoming lifelong learners and socially responsible citizens.
div.a: Click here to view our school board goals which will help us achieve our mission.

br.span: er 50 ILCS 205/20, if you wish to communicate with elected officials of the School District, please email:

a.title: Link to email La Salle Board of Education
